content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron ore mining and smelting setup at (15.5, 70.5) - UPDATED
- Electric mining drill at (15.5, 70.5) now powered and operational (producing 42 iron ore per minute)
- Wooden chest at (15.5, 73.5) now contains 52 iron ore
- Small electric pole at (13.5, 70.5) now properly connected
- Stone furnace moved to (16.0, 76.0) (still unfueled)
- Burner inserter added at (15.5, 74.5) (fueled with 9 coal)
- Transport belt path remains from drill to chest (17.5, 72.5 to 25.5, 72.5)

### Power generation setup at (-9.5, -0.5) - UPDATED
- Offshore pump at (-9.5, 0.5) operational
- Boiler at (-5.0, 3.5) now out of fuel (was previously fueled with coal)
- Steam engine at (-0.5, 3.5) still operational but boiler fuel depleted
- Pipe network remains operational but boiler inactive
- Power pole network now properly connected to mining setup

## ERROR TIPS

### Fuel management issues (updated)
- Monitor boiler fuel levels to prevent power interruptions (new failure)
- Ensure furnaces have fuel before expecting operation (3 total failures)
- Verify inserter fuel status when using burner inserters

### Production chain verification (updated)
- Check all components are properly connected (now with power issues resolved)
- Verify fuel supply chains for all burner devices
- Test production flow after making changes to setups

### Placement collision errors (continued)
- Still verify target position is clear before placing entities (24 total occurrences)
- Clear old entities completely before placing new ones (3 total failures)

### Inserter operation (updated)
- Ensure proper spacing when placing inserters (9 total failed attempts)
- Verify inserter fuel status before operations (burner inserters)
- Check inserter directionality when connecting production chains

### Belt connection rules (continued)
- Cannot connect belts directly to inserters (2 total occurrences)
- Verify source and destination entity types before belt connections

### Power system monitoring (updated)
- Now need to monitor fuel levels for continuous power (new issue)
- Verify power network coverage when adding new devices
- Check power pole spacing requirements
